name: Disco Deathmatch
description:
An intense dance battle to the death! 

Fill your bar with moves using the d-pad and face buttons, hurling the disco ball at them. If they do not manage to replicate your masterful dance in time,  one of their spotlights will fade. The battle continues at an increasing intensity until only one dancer remains.

Playable solo against an AI, or with two players. Each player will require a gamepad.
